pullrequest.title: Apply gazebo extensions to all collisions

content.raw:
I just checked, and all the collisions except the ones on the head have reasonable friction now. The following still have the default large friction, but we would have to change that in drcsim:
~~~
head_collision
head_collision_head_other
hokuyo_link_collision
hokuyo_link_collision_hokuyo_link_other
~~~
content.html:
